resources.string: FindMe allows anyone to locate their phone remotely via SMS. FindMe retrieves the phone\'s GPS coordinates and replies with those coordinates to whomever requests for them. Coordinate requests is done by sending in an SMS with the specified keyword.
A request for the phone\'s GPS coordinates is only triggered if the incoming SMS contains this keyword. It should therefore be something unique e.g 5716, wr23dv
GPS timeout is the maximum time in seconds FindMe will wait for GPS coordinates after which it wil default to coordinates supplied by the mobile network.
